attributes.action: Allow open book exams for English Advanced Higher/Higher/NAT5.
attributes.additional_details: This is a common theme among Scottish students and should be acknowledged and changed accordingly.
attributes.background: Allow open book exams for English Advanced Higher/Higher/National 5. The exam should be a test of skill, not memory as the closed book system currently provides.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
